There was one other sighting in Winston-Salem on or around October 26th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Taking video of tops of trees, facing north and saw a streak from west to east at 23 second mark
divs: Sighting DetailsI was home this weekend with not much to do and after reading online about UFOs being captured in pictures by accident, I decided to take a few pictures as an experiment. So on Saturday, I took a few digital pictures of the sky and indeed captured on film some amazing orbs. A few of the pictures were submitted to your website on Saturday. So Sunday afternoon I decided to try taking random videos of the same area, North of my home. I was standing on my front porch and began filming with my digital camera. While video taping the tops of trees and sky, I saw a brief streak moving from west to east. After I loaded the mpeg file into my computer, I performed a frame by frame of the video, which shows a cylinder shaped object at the 23 second mark, with small wings at the sides and small v shaped rear, lower wings. It also looks like a missile. I heard no sound at all. I'm not quite sure why this part of North Carolina is so active with these unknown objects. Furthermore, I would like to know why I am able to capture these objects so often. I don't really have any negative emotions about these observations and it's a bit fascinating. I believe my experiment worked.
